title: Revert is significantly slower than close and reopen in java editor
description: When performing the operation of closing and reopening a file in the java editor, it is observed that the process is much faster compared to using the 'Revert' operation.
OB:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog.
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
However, if you repeat steps 1 and 2, and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes approximately 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original content.
